com.a9development.a9cipher
Class DES

java.lang.Object
  com.a9development.a9cipher.DES
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class DES
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

A class for working with the Data Encryption Standard, more commonly known as DES. It will accept a String, byte array, or boolean array as input to the constructor for the input text and key. Currently all inputs are restricted to the normal DES block size of 64 bits, 8 bytes, or 16 hex digits, but this will be expanded in future versions for to support larger and smaller text and smaller keys, by means of padding to the next 8 bytes.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Daniel Kotowski
